media.headline: Beasley sings national anthem
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Beasley sings national anthem at Globe Life
media.bigblurb: Rangers third-base coach Tony Beasley sings the national anthem on Opening Day at Globe Life Park

media.headline: Gomes throws out Gomez
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Gomes nabs Gomez at second, call stands
media.bigblurb: Yan Gomes fires to second base and nabs Carlos Gomez attempting to steal, and after review, the call stands in the 1st

media.headline: Indians' starting lineup
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: The Indians' starting lineup is announced
media.bigblurb: The Indians' starting lineup is announced before the game against the Rangers at Globe Life Park

media.headline: Odor's solo home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Odor belts a solo homer to open the scoring
media.bigblurb: Rougned Odor lifts a solo shot to right field to open the scoring for the Rangers in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Rangers' starting lineup
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: The Rangers' starting lineup is announced
media.bigblurb: The Rangers' starting lineup is announced before the game against the Indians at Globe Life Park

media.headline: Lindor's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Lindor plates Almonte with a sacrifice fly
media.bigblurb: Francisco Lindor drives a ball to left field and scores Abraham Almonte with the sacrifice fly to tie the game at 1 in the top of the 3rd

media.headline: Gomez's solo home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Gomez hammers a solo shot to left field
media.bigblurb: Carlos Gomez connects and drives a solo homer to left field to give the Rangers a 2-1 lead in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Williams throws out first pitch
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Williams throws out ceremonial first pitch
media.bigblurb: Arlington mayor Jeff Williams is honored at Globe Life Park by throwing out the ceremonial first pitch on Opening Day

media.headline: Odor's three-run home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Odor drills a three-run shot to right-center
media.bigblurb: Rougned Odor crushes a three-run home run to right-center field, notching his second homer of the game to give the Rangers a 5-1 lead

media.headline: Ramirez's two-run home run
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Ramirez belts a two-run shot to right-center
media.bigblurb: Jose Ramirez drives a two-run homer to right-center field to cut the Indians' deficit to 5-3 in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: Diaz's nice diving catch
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Diaz robs Mazara with a nice diving grab
media.bigblurb: Yandy Diaz lays out to make a nice diving catch, robbing Nomar Mazara of a hit in the bottom of the 5th inning

media.headline: Diaz doubles for first ML hit
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Diaz rips a double to tally first career hit
media.bigblurb: Yandy Diaz delivers an opposite-field double to notch his first knock in the Majors

media.headline: Encarnacion's game-tying homer
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Encarnacion launches a game-tying solo shot
media.bigblurb: Edwin Encarnacion crushes a game-tying solo home run to left field, tying the game at 5 in the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Almonte's go-ahead RBI single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Almonte lines a go-ahead RBI knock to center
media.bigblurb: Abraham Almonte rips an RBI single to center field to give the Indians a 6-5 lead in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Santana's RBI double
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Santana lines an RBI double to right-center
media.bigblurb: Carlos Santana laces an RBI double to right-center field to give the Indians a 7-5 lead in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Brantley's RBI single
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Brantley extends the lead with an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Michael Brantley delivers an RBI single to right field to extend the Indians' lead to 8-5 in the top of the 9th inning

media.headline: Andrus drives a triple to left
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Andrus triples past Brantley in left field
media.bigblurb: Elvis Andrus drives a triple over the reach of Michael Brantley in the bottom of the 9th inning

media.headline: Allen K's side to notch save
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Allen strikes out the side to earn the save
media.bigblurb: Cody Allen strikes out the side to notch the save in the Indians' 8-5 victory over the Rangers on Opening Day

media.headline: Odor begins a nice double play
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Odor starts a nice frame-ending double play
media.bigblurb: Rougned Odor fields a grounder and quickly throws to second to begin a 4-6-3 frame-ending double play in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Kluber's first K of the season
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Kluber fans Napoli to notch first strikeout
media.bigblurb: Corey Kluber whiffs Mike Napoli swinging to tally his first strikeout of the season in the bottom of the 1st inning

media.headline: Diaz crosses the dish
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Diaz scores on a wild pitch
media.bigblurb: Yandy Diaz comes in to score from third after Abraham Almonte strikes out and the ball gets past the catcher

media.headline: Rangers double up Santana
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Rangers turn two on errant baserunning
media.bigblurb: Jurickson Profar makes a catch and fires home, but Joey Gallo cuts off the throw and tosses to second to double up Carlos Santana

media.headline: Darvish escapes a jam
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Darvish escapes a jam with runners on
media.bigblurb: After inducing a bases-loaded double play, Yu Darvish gets Michael Brantley to ground out to escape a jam with runners on second and third

media.headline: Darvish starts a double play
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Darvish induces a DP with the bases loaded
media.bigblurb: Yu Darvish induces a 1-2-3 double play from Francisco Lindor in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Statcast: Gomez's 461-ft. shot
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Gomez crushes a 461-foot home run to left
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the distance of Carlos Gomez's Opening Day home run, the longest Opening Day home run of the Statcast era

media.headline: Odor crushes two home runs
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Odor powers the Rangers with two home runs
media.bigblurb: Rougned Odor belts a solo home run in his first at-bat and drills a three-run shot in his second at-bat vs. the Indians on Opening Day

media.headline: Must C: Edwin leads rally to win
media.blurb: Must C Clutch: Encarnacion, Almonte lead comeback
media.bigblurb: Edwin Encarnacion belts a game-tying homer and Abraham Almonte hits a go-ahead RBI single to spur the Indians' come-from-behind victory

media.headline: Indians' 9th-inning rally
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Indians plate three in 9th-inning rally
media.bigblurb: The Indians rally to plate three, highlighted by RBI singles from Abraham Almonte and Michael Brantley and an RBI double from Carlos Santana

media.headline: Bannister on Odor, losing lead
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Bannister talks blowing late lead in opener
media.bigblurb: Rangers manager Jeff Bannister talks to the media about Rougned Odor's two homer game in his teams' 8-5 loss to the Indians

media.headline: Francona on win over the Rangers
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Francona on come-from-behind victory
media.bigblurb: Indians manager Terry Francona talks about late hits from Edwin Encarnacion and Abraham Almonte to help lead his club to a 8-5 victory

media.headline: Francona on comeback win
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Francona on facing Darvish, Kluber's outing
media.bigblurb: Indians manager Terry Francona discusses the IndiansA facing Yu Darvish and Corey Kluber's performance

media.headline: Diaz on first hit in the Majors
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Diaz on first Major League hit in his debut
media.bigblurb: Yandy Diaz discusses his first knock in his Major League debut on Opening Day

media.headline: Miller on comeback victory
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Miller discusses comeback vs. Rangers
media.bigblurb: Indians pitcher Andrew Miller reacts to the Indians' 8-5 victory over the Rangers on Opening Day

media.headline: 4/3/17 CG: CLE@TEX
media.blurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: CLE@TEX
media.bigblurb: 4/3/17 Condensed Game: CLE@TEX

media.headline: Recap: CLE 8, TEX 5
media.blurb: 4/3/17: Indians best Rangers behind 9th-inning rally
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: The Indians topped the Rangers with homers from Jose Ramirez, Edwin Encarnacion and a rally in the 9th on Opening Day

media.headline: Kluber on keeping Indians close
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Kluber on finishing strong in first start
media.bigblurb: Indians ace Corey Kluber discusses keeping his team in the game after falling behind against the Rangers in his first Opening Day start

media.headline: Darvish talks Opening Day start
media.blurb: CLE@TEX: Darvish looking on bright side
media.bigblurb: Rangers starting pitcher Yu Darvish talks about the positives he saw after a no decision in his Opening Day start
